name: Transfer Students and UCORE
description: Table-encapsulated explanation of how UCORE requirements apply to transfer students.
data: Then you still need to fulfill these University Common Requirements:
An approved transferable Associate of Science (AS-T)

• Roots of Contemporary Issues [ROOT] course (i.e., History 305)
  • Second [COMM] or [WRTG] course
  • Diversity [DIVR] course
  • Integrative Capstone [CAPS] course
Transfer courses evaluated on a course-by-course basis.
